posts.post_title: T206s, T205s and T207s for Sale...HOFers, MLers, tough backs, etc. Price drop 9/10!!

t205 Wallace (w/ cap) PSA 2 -- $150

t206 Ball Piedmont 350-460 PSA 4 -- $165

t207 Byrne Recruit SGC 40 -- $65

-Brian
